1. æ ¸å¿ƒæ¶æ„å·®å¼‚ â€‹

Vue2 - Object.defineProperty

javascript
// Vue2å“åº”å¼åŸç†
function defineReactive(obj, key, val) {
  Object.defineProperty(obj, key, {
    get() {
      // ä¾èµ–æ”¶é›†
      console.log(`è®¿é—®äº† ${key}`)
      return val
    },
    set(newVal) {
      if (newVal !== val) {
        console.log(`${key} ä» ${val} å˜ä¸º ${newVal}`)
        val = newVal
        // è§¦å‘æ›´æ–°
      }
    }
  })
}

// Vue2çš„é™åˆ¶
const data = { name: 'å¼ ä¸‰' }
defineReactive(data, 'name', 'å¼ ä¸‰')

// æ— æ³•æ£€æµ‹æ–°å¢å±æ€§
data.age = 25 // ä¸ä¼šè§¦å‘å“åº”å¼æ›´æ–°
delete data.name // ä¸ä¼šè§¦å‘å“åº”å¼æ›´æ–°

// æ•°ç»„å˜æ›´æ£€æµ‹é™åˆ¶
const arr = [1, 2, 3]
arr[0] = 4 // ä¸ä¼šè§¦å‘æ›´æ–°
arr.length = 0 // ä¸ä¼šè§¦å‘æ›´æ–°

Vue3 - Proxy

javascript
// Vue3å“åº”å¼åŸç†
function reactive(target) {
  return new Proxy(target, {
    get(target, key, receiver) {
      console.log(`è®¿é—®äº† ${key}`)
      // ä¾èµ–æ”¶é›†
      track(target, key)
      return Reflect.get(target, key, receiver)
    },
    set(target, key, value, receiver) {
      const oldValue = target[key]
      const result = Reflect.set(target, key, value, receiver)
      if (value !== oldValue) {
        console.log(`${key} ä» ${oldValue} å˜ä¸º ${value}`)
        // è§¦å‘æ›´æ–°
        trigger(target, key)
      }
      return result
    },
    deleteProperty(target, key) {
      const hadKey = hasOwn(target, key)
      const result = Reflect.deleteProperty(target, key)
      if (result && hadKey) {
        // è§¦å‘åˆ é™¤æ›´æ–°
        trigger(target, key)
      }
      return result
    }
  })
}

// Vue3çš„ä¼˜åŠ¿
const state = reactive({ name: 'å¼ ä¸‰' })

// å¯ä»¥æ£€æµ‹æ–°å¢å±æ€§
state.age = 25 // ä¼šè§¦å‘å“åº”å¼æ›´æ–°
delete state.name // ä¼šè§¦å‘å“åº”å¼æ›´æ–°

// æ•°ç»„å˜æ›´å®Œå…¨æ”¯æŒ
const arr = reactive([1, 2, 3])
arr[0] = 4 // ä¼šè§¦å‘æ›´æ–°
arr.length = 0 // ä¼šè§¦å‘æ›´æ–°

Vue2 - é€‰é¡¹å¼API

vue
<template>
  <div>
    <p>{{ message }}</p>
    <p>è®¡æ•°: {{ count }}</p>
    <p>åŒå€: {{ doubleCount }}</p>
    <button @click="increment">å¢åŠ </button>
  </div>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: 'Counter',
  
  // æ•°æ®
  data() {
    return {
      count: 0,
      message: 'Hello Vue2'
    }
  },
  
  // è®¡ç®—å±æ€§
  computed: {
    doubleCount() {
      return this.count * 2
    }
  },
  
  // æ–¹æ³•
  methods: {
    increment() {
      this.count++
    },
    
    fetchData() {
      // APIè°ƒç”¨
    }
  },
  
  // ç”Ÿå‘½å‘¨æœŸ
  created() {
    console.log('ç»„ä»¶åˆ›å»º')
  },
  
  mounted() {
    console.log('ç»„ä»¶æŒ‚è½½')
    this.fetchData()
  },
  
  // ç›‘å¬å™¨
  watch: {
    count(newVal, oldVal) {
      console.log(`countä»${oldVal}å˜ä¸º${newVal}`)
    }
  }
}
</script>

Vue3 - ç»„åˆå¼API

vue
<template>
  <div>
    <p>{{ message }}</p>
    <p>è®¡æ•°: {{ count }}</p>
    <p>åŒå€: {{ doubleCount }}</p>
    <button @click="increment">å¢åŠ </button>
  </div>
</template>

<script setup>
import { ref, computed, watch, onMounted } from 'vue'

// å“åº”å¼æ•°æ®

const message = ref('Hello Vue3')

// è®¡ç®—å±æ€§

// æ–¹æ³•

  count.value++
}

const fetchData = async () => {
  // APIè°ƒç”¨
}

// ç”Ÿå‘½å‘¨æœŸ

  console.log('ç»„ä»¶æŒ‚è½½')
  fetchData()
})

// ç›‘å¬å™¨

  console.log(`countä»${oldVal}å˜ä¸º${newVal}`)
})
</script>

Vue2 - Mixins

// counterMixin.js
export const counterMixin = {
  data() {
    return {
      count: 0
    }
  },
  
  methods: {
    increment() {
      this.count++
    }
  }
}

// ç»„ä»¶ä¸­ä½¿ç”¨

  mixins: [counterMixin],
  
  // é—®é¢˜ï¼š
  // 1. å‘½åå†²çª
  // 2. æ¥æºä¸æ˜ç¡®
  // 3. éšå¼ä¾èµ–

Vue3 - ç»„åˆå¼å‡½æ•°

javascript
// useCounter.js
import { ref } from 'vue'

export function useCounter(initialValue = 0) {
  const count = ref(initialValue)
  
  const increment = () => {
    count.value++
  }
  
  const decrement = () => {
    count.value--
  }
  
  return {
    count,
    increment,
    decrement
  }
}

// ç»„ä»¶ä¸­ä½¿ç”¨
import { useCounter } from './useCounter'

const { count, increment, decrement } = useCounter(10)

// ä¼˜åŠ¿ï¼š
// 1. æ˜ç¡®çš„æ¥æº
// 2. æ²¡æœ‰å‘½åå†²çª
// 3. æ›´å¥½çš„ç±»å‹æ¨å¯¼
// 4. æ›´çµæ´»çš„ç»„åˆ

import Vue from 'vue'
import Component from 'vue-class-component'

@Component
export default class Counter extends Vue {
  count: number = 0
  
  increment(): void {
    this.count++
  }
  
  get doubleCount(): number {
    return this.count * 2
  }
}

Vue3 - åŸç”ŸTypeScriptæ”¯æŒ

  id: number
  name: string
}

const count = ref<number>(0)
const user = ref<User | null>(null)

const doubleCount = computed((): number => count.value * 2)

const increment = (): void => {
  count.value++
}
</script>

8. è¿‡æ»¤å™¨å¯¹æ¯” â€‹

Vue2 - å†…ç½®è¿‡æ»¤å™¨

vue
<template>
  <div>
    <!-- è¿‡æ»¤å™¨è¯­æ³• -->
    <p>{{ message | capitalize }}</p>
    <p>{{ price | currency('$') }}</p>
  </div>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  filters: {
    capitalize(value) {
      if (!value) return ''
      return value.toString().charAt(0).toUpperCase() + value.slice(1)
    },
    
    currency(value, symbol = 'Â¥') {
      return symbol + value.toFixed(2)
    }
  }
}
</script>

Vue3 - ç§»é™¤è¿‡æ»¤å™¨ï¼Œæ¨èè®¡ç®—å±æ€§æˆ–æ–¹æ³•

vue
<template>
  <div>
    <!-- ä½¿ç”¨è®¡ç®—å±æ€§ -->
    <p>{{ capitalizedMessage }}</p>
    <!-- ä½¿ç”¨æ–¹æ³• -->
    <p>{{ currency(price, '$') }}</p>
  </div>
</template>

<script setup>
import { computed } from 'vue'

const message = ref('hello world')
const price = ref(99.99)

const capitalizedMessage = computed(() => {
  if (!message.value) return ''
  return message.value.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + message.value.slice(1)
})

const currency = (value, symbol = 'Â¥') => {
  return symbol + value.toFixed(2)
}
</script>

  id: 'container',
  class: 'wrapper'
})
</script>

    <!-- å¯¹è±¡è¯­æ³• -->
    <div :class="{ active: isActive, 'text-danger': hasError }"></div>
    
    <!-- æ•°ç»„è¯­æ³• -->
    <div :class="[activeClass, errorClass]"></div>
    
    <!-- æ··åˆè¯­æ³• -->
    <div :class="[{ active: isActive }, errorClass]"></div>
    
    <!-- å†…è”æ ·å¼å¯¹è±¡è¯­æ³• -->
    <div :style="{ color: activeColor, fontSize: fontSize + 'px' }"></div>
    
    <!-- å†…è”æ ·å¼æ•°ç»„è¯­æ³• -->
    <div :style="[baseStyles, overridingStyles]"></div>
  </div>
</template>

<script setup>
import { ref, reactive } from 'vue'

const isActive = ref(true)
const hasError = ref(false)
const activeClass = ref('active')
const errorClass = ref('text-danger')
const activeColor = ref('red')
const fontSize = ref(30)

const baseStyles = reactive({
  color: 'blue',
  fontSize: '20px'
})

const overridingStyles = reactive({
  fontWeight: 'bold'
})
</script>

ç»„åˆå¼API â€‹

1. setupå‡½æ•°åŸºç¡€ â€‹

åŸºæœ¬ç”¨æ³• â€‹

vue
<template>
  <div>
    <p>{{ count }}</p>
    <button @click="increment">å¢åŠ </button>
  </div>
</template>

<script>
import { ref } from 'vue'

export default {
  setup() {
    const count = ref(0)
    
    const increment = () => {
      count.value++
    }
    
    return {
      count,
      increment
    }
  }
}
</script>

script setupè¯­æ³•ç³– â€‹

vue
<template>
  <div>
    <p>{{ count }}</p>
    <button @click="increment">å¢åŠ </button>
    <ChildComponent :count="count" @update="handleUpdate" />
  </div>
</template>

<script setup>
import { ref } from 'vue'
import ChildComponent from './ChildComponent.vue'

const count = ref(0)

const increment = () => {
  count.value++
}

const handleUpdate = (newValue) => {
  count.value = newValue
}
</script>

2. å“åº”å¼API â€‹

refå’Œreactive â€‹

vue
<script setup>
import { ref, reactive, computed, watch } from 'vue'

// ref - åŸºæœ¬ç±»å‹å“åº”å¼
const count = ref(0)
const message = ref('Hello')

// reactive - å¯¹è±¡å“åº”å¼
const state = reactive({
  name: 'å¼ ä¸‰',
  age: 25,
  hobbies: ['è¯»ä¹¦', 'æ¸¸æ³³']
})

// åµŒå¥—å¯¹è±¡
const user = reactive({
  profile: {
    name: 'æå››',
    settings: {
      theme: 'dark'
    }
  }
})

// è®¡ç®—å±æ€§
const doubleCount = computed(() => count.value * 2)
const fullName = computed({
  get() {
    return `${state.name} (${state.age}å²)`
  },
  set(value) {
    const [name, age] = value.split(' ')
    state.name = name
    state.age = parseInt(age)
  }
})

// ç›‘å¬å™¨
watch(count, (newValue, oldValue) => {
  console.log(`countä»${oldValue}å˜ä¸º${newValue}`)
})

watch(() => state.name, (newName) => {
  console.log(`å§“åå˜ä¸º: ${newName}`)
})

// æ·±åº¦ç›‘å¬
watch(state, (newState) => {
  console.log('stateå‘ç”Ÿå˜åŒ–:', newState)
}, { deep: true })
</script>

toRefå’ŒtoRefs â€‹

vue
<script setup>
import { reactive, toRef, toRefs } from 'vue'

const state = reactive({
  name: 'å¼ ä¸‰',
  age: 25
})

// toRef - åˆ›å»ºå•ä¸ªå±æ€§çš„ref
const name = toRef(state, 'name')

// toRefs - åˆ›å»ºæ‰€æœ‰å±æ€§çš„ref
const { age } = toRefs(state)

// è§£æ„åä¿æŒå“åº”å¼
const stateRefs = toRefs(state)
</script>

å“åº”å¼ç³»ç»Ÿ â€‹

1. å“åº”å¼åŸç† â€‹

Proxyä»£ç† â€‹

javascript
// Vue3å“åº”å¼åŸç†ç®€åŒ–ç‰ˆ
function reactive(target) {
  return new Proxy(target, {
    get(target, key, receiver) {
      // ä¾èµ–æ”¶é›†
      track(target, key)
      return Reflect.get(target, key, receiver)
    },
    set(target, key, value, receiver) {
      const result = Reflect.set(target, key, value, receiver)
      // è§¦å‘æ›´æ–°
      trigger(target, key)
      return result
    }
  })
}

2. å“åº”å¼å·¥å…·å‡½æ•° â€‹

vue
<script setup>
import { 
  ref, 
  reactive, 
  readonly, 
  shallowRef, 
  shallowReactive,
  markRaw,
  toRaw,
  unref,
  isRef,
  isReactive,
  isReadonly,
  isProxy
} from 'vue'

// åŸºç¡€å“åº”å¼
const count = ref(0)
const state = reactive({ name: 'å¼ ä¸‰' })

// åªè¯»
const readonlyState = readonly(state)

// æµ…å±‚å“åº”å¼
const shallowState = shallowReactive({
  deep: {
    nested: 'value'
  }
})

// æ ‡è®°ä¸ºéå“åº”å¼
const nonReactiveObj = markRaw({
  data: 'some data'
})

// è·å–åŸå§‹å¯¹è±¡
const raw = toRaw(state)

// å·¥å…·å‡½æ•°
console.log(isRef(count)) // true
console.log(isReactive(state)) // true
console.log(isReadonly(readonlyState)) // true
console.log(isProxy(state)) // true
</script>

ç»„ä»¶é€šä¿¡ â€‹

1. Propså’ŒEmits â€‹

çˆ¶ç»„ä»¶ â€‹

vue
<template>
  <div>
    <ChildComponent 
      :title="title"
      :user="user"
      :items="items"
      @update-title="handleTitleUpdate"
      @custom-event="handleCustomEvent"
    />
  </div>
</template>

<script setup>
import { ref, reactive } from 'vue'
import ChildComponent from './ChildComponent.vue'

const title = ref('çˆ¶ç»„ä»¶æ ‡é¢˜')
const user = reactive({
  name: 'å¼ ä¸‰',
  age: 25
})
const items = ref(['item1', 'item2'])

const handleTitleUpdate = (newTitle) => {
  title.value = newTitle
}

const handleCustomEvent = (payload) => {
  console.log('æ”¶åˆ°è‡ªå®šä¹‰äº‹ä»¶:', payload)
}
</script>

å­ç»„ä»¶ â€‹

vue
<template>
  <div>
    <h2>{{ title }}</h2>
    <p>ç”¨æˆ·: {{ user.name }}, å¹´é¾„: {{ user.age }}</p>
    <ul>
      <li v-for="item in items" :key="item">{{ item }}</li>
    </ul>
    <button @click="updateTitle">æ›´æ–°æ ‡é¢˜</button>
    <button @click="emitCustomEvent">è§¦å‘è‡ªå®šä¹‰äº‹ä»¶</button>
  </div>
</template>

<script setup>
// å®šä¹‰props
const props = defineProps({
  title: {
    type: String,
    required: true,
    default: 'é»˜è®¤æ ‡é¢˜'
  },
  user: {
    type: Object,
    required: true
  },
  items: {
    type: Array,
    default: () => []
  }
})

// å®šä¹‰emits
const emit = defineEmits(['update-title', 'custom-event'])

const updateTitle = () => {
  emit('update-title', 'æ–°çš„æ ‡é¢˜')
}

const emitCustomEvent = () => {
  emit('custom-event', {
    message: 'è¿™æ˜¯è‡ªå®šä¹‰äº‹ä»¶',
    timestamp: Date.now()
  })
}
</script>

3. Provide/Inject â€‹

vue
<!-- ç¥–å…ˆç»„ä»¶ -->
<template>
  <div>
    <ChildComponent />
  </div>
</template>

<script setup>
import { provide, ref, reactive } from 'vue'
import ChildComponent from './ChildComponent.vue'

const theme = ref('dark')
const user = reactive({
  name: 'å¼ ä¸‰',
  role: 'admin'
})

// æä¾›æ•°æ®
provide('theme', theme)
provide('user', user)

// æä¾›æ–¹æ³•
provide('updateTheme', (newTheme) => {
  theme.value = newTheme
})
</script>
vue
<!-- åä»£ç»„ä»¶ -->
<template>
  <div :class="theme">
    <p>å½“å‰ä¸»é¢˜: {{ theme }}</p>
    <p>ç”¨æˆ·: {{ user.name }}</p>
    <button @click="changeTheme">åˆ‡æ¢ä¸»é¢˜</button>
  </div>
</template>

<script setup>
import { inject } from 'vue'

// æ³¨å…¥æ•°æ®
const theme = inject('theme', 'light') // é»˜è®¤å€¼
const user = inject('user')
const updateTheme = inject('updateTheme')

const changeTheme = () => {
  updateTheme(theme.value === 'dark' ? 'light' : 'dark')
}
</script>

<script setup>

  onBeforeMount,

  onUnmounted,
  onErrorCaptured,
  onActivated,
  onDeactivated
} from 'vue'

// æŒ‚è½½å‰
onBeforeMount(() => {
  console.log('ç»„ä»¶å³å°†æŒ‚è½½')
})

// æŒ‚è½½å
onMounted(() => {
  console.log('ç»„ä»¶å·²æŒ‚è½½')
  // DOMæ“ä½œ
  // å‘èµ·APIè¯·æ±‚
  // è®¾ç½®å®šæ—¶å™¨
})

// æ›´æ–°å‰
onBeforeUpdate(() => {
  console.log('ç»„ä»¶å³å°†æ›´æ–°')
})

// æ›´æ–°å
onUpdated(() => {
  console.log('ç»„ä»¶å·²æ›´æ–°')
})

// å¸è½½å‰
onBeforeUnmount(() => {
  console.log('ç»„ä»¶å³å°†å¸è½½')
  // æ¸…ç†å·¥ä½œ
})

// å¸è½½å
onUnmounted(() => {
  console.log('ç»„ä»¶å·²å¸è½½')
  // æ¸…ç†å®šæ—¶å™¨
  // ç§»é™¤äº‹ä»¶ç›‘å¬å™¨
})

// é”™è¯¯æ•è·

  console.log('æ•è·åˆ°é”™è¯¯:', error)
  return false // é˜»æ­¢é”™è¯¯ç»§ç»­ä¼ æ’­
})

// keep-aliveç»„ä»¶æ¿€æ´»
onActivated(() => {
  console.log('ç»„ä»¶è¢«æ¿€æ´»')
})

// keep-aliveç»„ä»¶åœç”¨
onDeactivated(() => {
  console.log('ç»„ä»¶è¢«åœç”¨')
})
</script>

2. ç”Ÿå‘½å‘¨æœŸå®è·µç¤ºä¾‹ â€‹

vue
<template>
  <div>
    <h2>ç”¨æˆ·åˆ—è¡¨</h2>
    <div v-if="loading">åŠ è½½ä¸­...</div>
    <ul v-else>
      <li v-for="user in users" :key="user.id">
        {{ user.name }}
      </li>
    </ul>
  </div>
</template>

<script setup>
import { ref, onMounted, onUnmounted } from 'vue'

const users = ref([])
const loading = ref(true)
let timer = null

// è·å–ç”¨æˆ·æ•°æ®
const fetchUsers = async () => {
  try {
    loading.value = true
    const response = await fetch('/api/users')
    users.value = await response.json()
  } catch (error) {
    console.error('è·å–ç”¨æˆ·å¤±è´¥:', error)
  } finally {
    loading.value = false
  }
}

// ç»„ä»¶æŒ‚è½½åè·å–æ•°æ®
onMounted(() => {
  fetchUsers()
  
  // è®¾ç½®å®šæ—¶åˆ·æ–°
  timer = setInterval(fetchUsers, 30000)
})

// ç»„ä»¶å¸è½½å‰æ¸…ç†
onUnmounted(() => {
  if (timer) {
    clearInterval(timer)
  }
})
</script>

æŒ‡ä»¤ç³»ç»Ÿ â€‹

äº‹ä»¶å¤„ç† â€‹

vue
<template>
  <div>
    <!-- åŸºç¡€äº‹ä»¶ -->
    <button @click="handleClick">ç‚¹å‡»</button>
    
    <!-- å†…è”å¤„ç†å™¨ -->
    <button @click="count++">{{ count }}</button>
    
    <!-- ä¼ é€’å‚æ•° -->
    <button @click="handleClickWithParam('å‚æ•°')">ä¼ å‚ç‚¹å‡»</button>
    
    <!-- è®¿é—®äº‹ä»¶å¯¹è±¡ -->
    <button @click="handleClickWithEvent($event)">äº‹ä»¶å¯¹è±¡</button>
    
    <!-- äº‹ä»¶ä¿®é¥°ç¬¦ -->
    <form @submit.prevent="handleSubmit">
      <input @keyup.enter="handleEnter" />
      <button type="submit">æäº¤</button>
    </form>
    
    <!-- é¼ æ ‡ä¿®é¥°ç¬¦ -->
    <button @click.left="handleLeftClick">å·¦é”®</button>
    <button @click.right.prevent="handleRightClick">å³é”®</button>
    
    <!-- ç³»ç»Ÿä¿®é¥°ç¬¦ -->
    <input @keyup.ctrl.enter="handleCtrlEnter" />
  </div>

<script setup>
import { ref } from 'vue'

const count = ref(0)

const handleClick = () => {
  console.log('æŒ‰é’®è¢«ç‚¹å‡»')
}

const handleClickWithParam = (param) => {
  console.log('å‚æ•°:', param)
}

const handleClickWithEvent = (event) => {
  console.log('äº‹ä»¶å¯¹è±¡:', event)
}

const handleSubmit = () => {
  console.log('è¡¨å•æäº¤')
}

const handleEnter = () => {
  console.log('å›è½¦é”®æŒ‰ä¸‹')
}

const handleLeftClick = () => {
  console.log('å·¦é”®ç‚¹å‡»')
}

const handleRightClick = () => {
  console.log('å³é”®ç‚¹å‡»')
}

const handleCtrlEnter = () => {
  console.log('Ctrl+Enterç»„åˆé”®')
}
</script>

2. è‡ªå®šä¹‰æŒ‡ä»¤ â€‹

å…¨å±€æŒ‡ä»¤ â€‹

javascript
// main.js
import { createApp } from 'vue'
import App from './App.vue'

const app = createApp(App)

// å…¨å±€è‡ªå®šä¹‰æŒ‡ä»¤
app.directive('focus', {
  mounted(el) {
    el.focus()
  }
})

app.directive('color', {
  mounted(el, binding) {
    el.style.color = binding.value
  },
  updated(el, binding) {
    el.style.color = binding.value
  }
})

app.mount('#app')

å±€éƒ¨æŒ‡ä»¤ â€‹

vue
<template>
  <div>
    <input v-focus />
    <p v-color="'red'">çº¢è‰²æ–‡æœ¬</p>
    <div v-loading="isLoading">å†…å®¹</div>
  </div>
</template>

<script setup>
import { ref } from 'vue'

const isLoading = ref(false)

// å±€éƒ¨è‡ªå®šä¹‰æŒ‡ä»¤
const vFocus = {
  mounted(el) {
    el.focus()
  }
}

const vColor = {
  mounted(el, binding) {
    el.style.color = binding.value
  },
  updated(el, binding) {
    el.style.color = binding.value
  }
}

const vLoading = {
  mounted(el, binding) {
    if (binding.value) {
      el.classList.add('loading')
    }
  },
  updated(el, binding) {
    if (binding.value) {
      el.classList.add('loading')
    } else {
      el.classList.remove('loading')
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style>
.loading {
  position: relative;
  pointer-events: none;
}

.loading::after {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
}

.loading::before {
  content: 'åŠ è½½ä¸­...';
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  left: 50%;
  transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
  z-index: 1;
}
</style>

2. PiniaçŠ¶æ€ç®¡ç† â€‹

javascript
// stores/counter.js
import { defineStore } from 'pinia'
import { ref, computed } from 'vue'

export const useCounterStore = defineStore('counter', () => {
  // state
  const count = ref(0)
  const name = ref('Eduardo')
  
  // getters
  const doubleCount = computed(() => count.value * 2)
  
  // actions
  function increment() {
    count.value++
  }
  
  function reset() {
    count.value = 0
  }
  
  return { count, name, doubleCount, increment, reset }
})
vue
<!-- ç»„ä»¶ä¸­ä½¿ç”¨Pinia -->

    <p>åŒå€: {{ counter.doubleCount }}</p>
    <button @click="counter.increment()">å¢åŠ </button>
    <button @click="counter.reset()">é‡ç½®</button>
  </div>
</template>

1. Vue RouteråŸºç¡€ â€‹

javascript
// router/index.js
import { createRouter, createWebHistory } from 'vue-router'
import Home from '@/views/Home.vue'
import About from '@/views/About.vue'
import User from '@/views/User.vue'

const routes = [
  {
    path: '/',
    name: 'Home',
    component: Home
  },
  {
    path: '/about',
    name: 'About',
    component: About
  },
  {
    path: '/user/:id',
    name: 'User',
    component: User,
    props: true
  },
  {
    path: '/admin',
    name: 'Admin',
    component: () => import('@/views/Admin.vue'),
    meta: { requiresAuth: true }
  }
]

const router = createRouter({
  history: createWebHistory(),
  routes
})

// è·¯ç”±å®ˆå«
router.beforeEach((to, from, next) => {
  if (to.meta.requiresAuth && !isAuthenticated()) {
    next('/login')
  } else {
    next()
  }
})

export default router

3. è™šæ‹Ÿæ»šåŠ¨ â€‹

vue
<template>
  <div class="virtual-list" @scroll="handleScroll">
    <div :style="{ height: totalHeight + 'px' }">
      <div 
        v-for="item in visibleItems" 
        :key="item.id"
        :style="{ 
          position: 'absolute',
          top: item.top + 'px',
          height: itemHeight + 'px'
        }"
      >
        {{ item.data }}
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</template>

<script setup>
import { ref, computed } from 'vue'

const props = defineProps(['items'])
const itemHeight = 50
const containerHeight = 400
const scrollTop = ref(0)

const totalHeight = computed(() => props.items.length * itemHeight)

const visibleItems = computed(() => {
  const start = Math.floor(scrollTop.value / itemHeight)
  const end = Math.min(
    start + Math.ceil(containerHeight / itemHeight) + 1,
    props.items.length
  )
  
  return props.items.slice(start, end).map((item, index) => ({
    id: start + index,
    data: item,
    top: (start + index) * itemHeight
  }))
})

const handleScroll = (e) => {
  scrollTop.value = e.target.scrollTop
}
</script>

TypeScripté›†æˆ â€‹

1. åŸºç¡€ç±»å‹å®šä¹‰ â€‹

vue
<template>
  <div>
    <h2>{{ user.name }}</h2>
    <p>å¹´é¾„: {{ user.age }}</p>
    <button @click="updateUser">æ›´æ–°ç”¨æˆ·</button>
  </div>
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
import { ref, reactive } from 'vue'

// æ¥å£å®šä¹‰
interface User {
  id: number
  name: string
  age: number
  email?: string
}

// ç±»å‹å®šä¹‰
type Status = 'loading' | 'success' | 'error'

// å“åº”å¼æ•°æ®ç±»å‹
const user = reactive<User>({
  id: 1,
  name: 'å¼ ä¸‰',
  age: 25
})

const status = ref<Status>('loading')
const users = ref<User[]>([])

// å‡½æ•°ç±»å‹
const updateUser = (): void => {
  user.age++
}

const fetchUser = async (id: number): Promise<User> => {
  const response = await fetch(`/api/users/${id}`)
  return response.json()
}
</script>

2. Propså’ŒEmitsç±»å‹ â€‹

vue
<template>
  <div>
    <h3>{{ title }}</h3>
    <p>{{ user.name }}</p>
    <button @click="handleClick">ç‚¹å‡»</button>
  </div>
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
interface User {
  id: number
  name: string
  age: number
}

interface Props {
  title: string
  user: User
  count?: number
}

interface Emits {
  (e: 'update', value: string): void
  (e: 'delete', id: number): void
}

// å®šä¹‰propsç±»å‹
const props = withDefaults(defineProps<Props>(), {
  count: 0
})

// å®šä¹‰emitsç±»å‹
const emit = defineEmits<Emits>()

const handleClick = () => {
  emit('update', 'new value')
  emit('delete', props.user.id)
}
</script>

3. ç»„åˆå¼å‡½æ•°ç±»å‹ â€‹

typescript
// composables/useCounter.ts
import { ref, computed, Ref } from 'vue'

interface UseCounterReturn {
  count: Ref<number>
  doubleCount: Ref<number>
  increment: () => void
  decrement: () => void
  reset: () => void
}

export function useCounter(initialValue: number = 0): UseCounterReturn {
  const count = ref(initialValue)
  
  const doubleCount = computed(() => count.value * 2)
  
  const increment = (): void => {
    count.value++
  }
  
  const decrement = (): void => {
    count.value--
  }
  
  const reset = (): void => {
    count.value = initialValue
  }
  
  return {
    count,
    doubleCount,
    increment,
    decrement,
    reset
  }
}

<!-- å¥½çš„ç»„ä»¶è®¾è®¡ -->
<template>
  <div class="user-card" :class="{ 'user-card--compact': compact }">
    <div class="user-card__avatar">
      <img :src="user.avatar" :alt="user.name" />
    </div>
    
    <div class="user-card__content">
      <h3 class="user-card__name">{{ user.name }}</h3>
      <p class="user-card__title">{{ user.title }}</p>
      
      <div class="user-card__actions">
        <slot name="actions" :user="user">
          <button @click="$emit('contact', user)">è”ç³»</button>
        </slot>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</template>

<script setup>
// æ¸…æ™°çš„æ¥å£å®šä¹‰
defineProps({
  user: {
    type: Object,
    required: true,
    validator: (user) => {
      return user && user.name && user.avatar
    }
  },
  compact: {
    type: Boolean,
    default: false
  }
})

defineEmits(['contact'])
</script>

2. ç»„åˆå¼å‡½æ•° â€‹

javascript
// composables/useApi.js
import { ref } from 'vue'

export function useApi() {
  const loading = ref(false)
  const error = ref(null)
  
  const request = async (url, options = {}) => {
    try {
      loading.value = true
      error.value = null
      
      const response = await fetch(url, {
        headers: {
          'Content-Type': 'application/json',
          ...options.headers
        },
        ...options
      })
      
      if (!response.ok) {
        throw new Error(`HTTP error! status: ${response.status}`)
      }
      
      return await response.json()
    } catch (err) {
      error.value = err.message
      throw err
    } finally {
      loading.value = false
    }
  }
  
  return {
    loading,
    error,
    request
  }
}
javascript
// composables/useLocalStorage.js
import { ref, watch } from 'vue'

export function useLocalStorage(key, defaultValue) {
  const storedValue = localStorage.getItem(key)
  const value = ref(storedValue ? JSON.parse(storedValue) : defaultValue)
  
  watch(value, (newValue) => {
    localStorage.setItem(key, JSON.stringify(newValue))
  }, { deep: true })
  
  return value
}

3. é”™è¯¯å¤„ç† â€‹

vue
<template>
  <div>
    <div v-if="error" class="error">
      {{ error }}
      <button @click="retry">é‡è¯•</button>
    </div>
    
    <div v-else-if="loading">åŠ è½½ä¸­...</div>
    
    <div v-else>
      <!-- æ­£å¸¸å†…å®¹ -->
    </div>
  </div>
</template>

<script setup>
import { ref, onMounted, onErrorCaptured } from 'vue'

const loading = ref(false)
const error = ref(null)
const data = ref(null)

const fetchData = async () => {
  try {
    loading.value = true
    error.value = null
    
    const response = await fetch('/api/data')
    if (!response.ok) {
      throw new Error('è·å–æ•°æ®å¤±è´¥')
    }
    
    data.value = await response.json()
  } catch (err) {
    error.value = err.message
  } finally {
    loading.value = false
  }
}

const retry = () => {
  fetchData()
}

onMounted(() => {
  fetchData()
})

// æ•è·å­ç»„ä»¶é”™è¯¯
onErrorCaptured((err, instance, info) => {
  console.error('ç»„ä»¶é”™è¯¯:', err)
  error.value = 'ç»„ä»¶æ¸²æŸ“å‡ºé”™'
  return false
})
</script>

4. æ€§èƒ½ç›‘æ§ â€‹

javascript
// utils/performance.js
export function measurePerformance(name, fn) {
  return async (...args) => {
    const start = performance.now()
    
    try {
      const result = await fn(...args)
      const end = performance.now()
      
      console.log(`${name} æ‰§è¡Œæ—¶é—´: ${end - start}ms`)
      
      return result
    } catch (error) {
      const end = performance.now()
      console.error(`${name} æ‰§è¡Œå¤±è´¥ (${end - start}ms):`, error)
      throw error
    }
  }
}

// ä½¿ç”¨ç¤ºä¾‹
const optimizedFetch = measurePerformance('APIè¯·æ±‚', fetch)
